picked_headlines.summary: Vision-based framework for UAV-UGV integration achieves high accuracy in heading prediction without GPS reliance.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article presents a significant advancement in autonomous vehicle technology, offering a practical solution for GPS-independent navigation, which is crucial for both technical audiences and stakeholders interested in autonomous systems.

picked_headlines.summary: NVIDIA's GenAI toolchain provides a comprehensive architecture for efficient AI system management.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article highlights a major industry development in AI infrastructure, appealing to both technical audiences and stakeholders interested in scalable AI solutions.

digest:
- *Training Multi-Image Vision Agents via End2End Reinforcement Learning* enhances multi-image QA tasks using end-to-end RL, improving tool use and attention in VLMs without costly fine-tuning. More at https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.08980
- *Tensor-Compressed and Fully-Quantized Training of Neural PDE Solvers* offers efficient PINN training on edge devices, achieving speed and energy savings. Check it out at https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.09202
- *RAG-HAR: Retrieval Augmented Generation-based Human Activity Recognition* achieves state-of-the-art results without model training. Learn more at https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.08984
- *Towards Lossless Ultimate Vision Token Compression for VLMs* proposes LUVC framework for efficient token compression, enhancing speed with minimal accuracy loss. Details at https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.09010
- *LLM4XCE: Large Language Models for Extremely Large-Scale Massive MIMO Channel Estimation* improves channel estimation in XL-MIMO, enhancing accuracy in 6G networks. Explore at https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.08955
- *SWEnergy: An Empirical Study on Energy Efficiency in Agentic Issue Resolution Frameworks with SLMs* highlights energy inefficiencies in agentic frameworks, advocating for better architecture designs. Read more at https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.09543
- *Hetero-SplitEE: Split Learning of Neural Networks with Early Exits for Heterogeneous IoT Devices* enables collaborative training with tailored split points, enhancing efficiency and accuracy. More at https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.09313
- *Luxical: High-Speed Lexical-Dense Text Embeddings* offers a new library for fast, cost-effective text embeddings, combining TF-IDF and neural networks. Discover more at https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.09015
- *MentraSuite: Post-Training Large Language Models for Mental Health Reasoning and Assessment* enhances LLMs for mental health by improving reasoning quality and reliability. Details at https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.09636
- *Institutional AI Sovereignty Through Gateway Architecture: Implementation Report from Fontys ICT* advocates for dedicated leadership in AI strategy. Learn more at https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.08978
